ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Question about Fear.
ygData.msgSnippet: It used to work, can t remember the facts about the change tho. Think it had something to do with they had to hardcode charm so it didnt work anymore since
ygData.messageBody:
It used to work, can't remember the facts about the change tho. Think it had
something to do with they had to hardcode charm so it didnt work anymore
since people charmed others and sent them on uber guards =P

-Domi

-----Original Message-----
From: stonemn@... [mailto:stonemn@...]
Sent: den 2 april 2001 21:05
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Question about Fear.


Why wouldn't the spell Fear work on a PvP server? I mean, I can see its
obvious problems, but it's as bad as root or probably other similar spells.
